long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QuickMinutes allows you to attach meeting Agendas to your Google Meeting.

Make unproductive meetings a thing of the past by using an all-in-one meeting management software that allows you to create agendas, view meeting minutes - all from your calendar event.

Have an upcoming meeting that you are dreading because you know that it is going to be unproductive? Use our ‘request an agenda’ feature to politely show the meeting organiser that you expect the meeting to achieve an outcome.

Supercharge your Google Calendar to - Save time, experience less meeting fatigue and be seen as a ‘productivity champion’ by your colleagues.

How QuickMinutes will help change your meetings for the better 📈

📄 Create an agenda: Make creating agendas a breeze by creating them directly from within the calendar event - no need to worry about forgetting to set an agenda and having a meeting that leads nowhere. All your meeting productivity tools directly within your favourite calendar, right at your fingertips.

🧳 Take your agendas to a whole new level by using one of our 30+ templates available in our meeting template library - allowing you to find a high-performance template to fit your unique meeting needs.

🤝 Tired of being invited to endless meetings that lead nowhere? Encourage others to respect your time by requesting an agenda prior to attending the meeting. Ready, agenda set, go.

🤭 Running late for a meeting? No need to panic, just open the calendar event and open the agenda with a single click. Always stay in control by being able to view all the upcoming meetings’ agendas directly within the calendar event. Just open your calendar and get a ‘bird’s eye view’ of all your upcoming meetings by seeing their associated agendas all in one place - ready to go.

🗄️ Love your google calendar? Supercharge it with QuickMinutes to be able to view all meeting notes, anytime, anywhere - from any device. 

🌍 Supercharge your productivity by being able to view all meeting notes, anytime, anywhere - from any device.

🙌 Share with other stakeholders the outcomes of meetings & decisions taken - better communication, better teamwork.

📜 Let others know that you expect the meeting to accomplish its objectives by requesting meeting notes from the event. Be seen as you truly are - a professional that gets work done.

📋 Easily record the meeting minutes - without losing context by using the agenda to take notes during or after the meeting. No more agonizingly trying to remember what happened. Be the person your team can count on.

Join over 8,000 productive teams who use QuickMinutes on a consistent basis to make sure that their meetings are productive. Forget about manually typing out agendas, printing them, emailing them, making sure everyone has read them, reformatting them to make sure they look good, desperately searching for the agenda in every folder while everyone is waiting…and have the whole process streamlined and as automated as possible by using an all-in-one meeting management solution, QuickMinutes.

✉️ No need to manually send the agenda through various channels & desperately hoping that everyone will get the agenda - with QuickMinutes all you have to do is fill in the attendees…and that’s it, we take care of everything else.

⏱️ Save time (& headache) by letting QuickMinutes manage your meetings while you focus on what matters - having a productive meeting.

✅ Assign & track action items: Someone needs to do something? Don’t let that ‘something’ slip through the cracks by assigning action items to specific people with due dates.

🌳 Go paperless: Why waste paper on repeatedly printing out agendas that are destined to be thrown away? Have everything at your fingertips - access your agenda anytime, anywhere from any device.

📎 Stop frantically searching for that spreadsheet, that pitch deck, that report…and just have everything conveniently attached to your meeting- ready to go.

☁️ Secure cloud backup for all your meeting agendas & notes. Focus your time on leading effective meetings - not keeping track of endless files and hoping nothing gets lost.

🤖 Smart topics: Have the feeling that those meetings just keep going in circles? With our smart topics feature you can track the agenda items that your team is discussing - helping make sure that your team is actually making progress.

😀 All your manual meeting preparation taken care of - Less stress, more success with your meetings.

🏷️ QuickMinutes has a free forever plan, available up to 10 users.
